strings.welcome_text_1: Use the arrow keys or swipe to move.
strings.welcome_text_2: Get the Level filled with gems completely!
strings.level_complete_text: Click or press spacebar for next level.
strings.zoom_tooltip: Hold to see the full level
strings.win_text_2: Nice Game, Wanna give it another go?!

fields.name: Welcome Title

fields.description: Game Title- will be overridden by the Game Image if that is set

fields.description: Congratulatory text for winning the game
